entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
